attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: clamping companies receive their revenue from the fines imposed. This is clearly wrong. Car Park personnel should be in place to help as well as penalise. Fixed sum cotracts would eradicate this problem - persistent offenders could be penalised using a suitable database based on previous transgressions

rejection.details: '...petition the Prime Minister to change clamping' does not make any sense.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
